welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tashkent, the charming capital of Uzbekistan known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and bustling bazaars. We hope you enjoy exploring all that our city has to offer and have a wonderful stay!

restaurants.name: HORI japanese & Pan-Asia restaurant and lounge
restaurants.description: HORI japanese & Pan-Asia restaurant and lounge is a seafood restaurant located in Toshkent.

restaurants.name: Syrovarnya (Сыроварня)
restaurants.description: Syrovarnya (Сыроварня) is a italian restaurant located in Toshkent.

restaurants.name: Street Burger
restaurants.description: Street Burger is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Assorti Restaurant & Sushi Bar
restaurants.description: Assorti Restaurant & Sushi Bar is a japanese restaurant located in Toshkent.
restaurants.address: 2, Uzbekiston Ovozi Street, Toshkent, Toshkent Shahri

restaurants.name: Дом Выпечки
restaurants.description: Дом Выпечки is a bakery located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
